mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T02_PERSONAL ( NO , FIRST_NAME , LAST_NAME , PASSWORD , MOBILE , MAILE , BIRTH_DATE , BIRTH_TIME , SEX , COVER , HEAD_PORTRAIT , VIDEO , INFOMATION , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , REGEDIT_DATE , REGEDIT_TIME , STATUS , DEL_FLG , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME , LAST_USER , LAST_DATE , LAST_TIME ) VALUES ( #{NO} , #{FirstName} , #{LastName} , #{Password} , #{Mobile} , #{Maile} , #{BirthDate} , #{BirthTime} , #{Sex} , #{Cover} , #{HeadPortrait} , #{Video} , #{Infomation} , #{Latitude} , #{Longitude} , #{RegeditDate} , #{RegeditTime} , #{Status} , #{DelFlg} , #{CreateUser} , #{CreateDate} , #{CreateTime} , #{LastUser} , curdate() , curtime() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T02_PERSONAL SET NO = #{NO} , FIRST_NAME = #{FirstName} , LAST_NAME = #{LastName} , PASSWORD = #{Password} , MOBILE = #{Mobile} , MAILE = #{Maile} , BIRTH_DATE = #{BirthDate} , BIRTH_TIME = #{BirthTime} , SEX = #{Sex} , COVER = #{Cover} , HEAD_PORTRAIT = #{HeadPortrait} , VIDEO = #{Video} , INFOMATION = #{Infomation} , LATITUDE = #{Latitude} , LONGITUDE = #{Longitude} , REGEDIT_DATE = #{RegeditDate} , REGEDIT_TIME = #{RegeditTime} , STATUS = #{Status} , DEL_FLG = #{DelFlg} , CREATE_USER = #{CreateUser} , CREATE_DATE = #{CreateDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{CreateTime} , LAST_USER = #{LastUser} , LAST_DATE = curdate() , LAST_TIME = curtime() WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "ID" , NO AS "NO" , FIRST_NAME AS "FirstName" , LAST_NAME AS "LastName" , PASSWORD AS "Password" , MOBILE AS "Mobile" , MAILE AS "Maile" , BIRTH_DATE AS "BirthDate" , BIRTH_TIME AS "BirthTime" , SEX AS "Sex" , COVER AS "Cover" , HEAD_PORTRAIT AS "HeadPortrait" , VIDEO AS "Video" , INFOMATION AS "Infomation" , LATITUDE AS "Latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "Longitude" , REGEDIT_DATE AS "RegeditDate" , REGEDIT_TIME AS "RegeditTime" , STATUS AS "Status" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T02_PERSONAL WHERE ID = #{ID}

SELECT ID AS "ID" , NO AS "NO" , FIRST_NAME AS "FirstName" , LAST_NAME AS "LastName" , PASSWORD AS "Password" , MOBILE AS "Mobile" , MAILE AS "Maile" , BIRTH_DATE AS "BirthDate" , BIRTH_TIME AS "BirthTime" , SEX AS "Sex" , COVER AS "Cover" , HEAD_PORTRAIT AS "HeadPortrait" , VIDEO AS "Video" , INFOMATION AS "Infomation" , LATITUDE AS "Latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "Longitude" , REGEDIT_DATE AS "RegeditDate" , REGEDIT_TIME AS "RegeditTime" , STATUS AS "Status" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T02_PERSONAL WHERE ID = #{ID} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "ID" , NO AS "NO" , FIRST_NAME AS "FirstName" , LAST_NAME AS "LastName" , PASSWORD AS "Password" , MOBILE AS "Mobile" , MAILE AS "Maile" , BIRTH_DATE AS "BirthDate" , BIRTH_TIME AS "BirthTime" , SEX AS "Sex" , COVER AS "Cover" , HEAD_PORTRAIT AS "HeadPortrait" , VIDEO AS "Video" , INFOMATION AS "Infomation" , LATITUDE AS "Latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "Longitude" , REGEDIT_DATE AS "RegeditDate" , REGEDIT_TIME AS "RegeditTime" , STATUS AS "Status" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T02_PERSONAL WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
